title: Live by Juanita Beach! 15+ Shops and restaurants right outside!
posting_body: Chelsea at Juanita Village is a beautiful community in a European Village setting.
The village offers a great selection of restaurants, shops, Starbucks and water views.

The Social lounge with shuffleboard, full-size modern kitchen and conference room, fitness center, and Wi-Fi Lounge, equipped with Computers and Printers, are just a few ways that the Chelsea at Juanita Village offers convenient and luxury living.
Come tour our beautiful apartment homes now, so you too can experience convenience and luxury in your new home.
We pride ourselves in providing you with all the amenities you need for the lifestyle you deserve, all without asking you to compromise your commitment to value.
We provide the resources for you to come home to luxurious resort-style living every day.
This is a Studio, 1 Bath, approximately 552 Sq.
*Views of Lake Washington and the Seattle skyline
$50 a month per dog, $35a month per cat
ONE BLOCK from Juanita Beach Park-
Take 116th Exit off 405 to the water!
Photos and/or floor plans shown are representational and may not depict the exact layout or features of the available unit.
If currently occupied, the individual unit you've selected may not be available to tour.
Please contact our leasing team with any questions.
